description: This file defines the NoteService class, which provides business logic and operations for managing Note entities, including create, list, getById, update, and delete functionality. It interacts with the NoteRepository for data persistence and uses supporting classes like NoteRequest, NoteMapper, and Note for data transfer, mapping, and entity representation.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Service class providing CRUD and search functionalities for Note entities.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new Note entity based on the provided NoteRequest object.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of notes, optionally filtered by a search query, with sorting.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a Note entity by its unique identifier, throwing exception if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Note with data from NoteRequest.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a Note by id, throws exception if the note does not exist.

methods.name: whitelistSort
methods.description: Ensures the sort parameters only include whitelisted fields for security and consistency.

methods.name: mapPage
methods.description: Converts a Page of Notes into a Page of another type using a mapping function.
